Privacy Policy
Effective Date: March 08, 2025

1. Introduction
Welcome to TechAssist! Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your information when you use our services. By accessing TechAssist, you agree to the practices described in this policy.

2. Information We Collect
We collect the following types of information:
• Personal Information – Name, email, and address when booking services.
• Device Information – Model, operating system, and specifications for troubleshooting.
• Payment Information – Billing details for subscription plans and one-time services.
• Service Usage Data – Logs of interactions, chat messages, and service history.
• Location Data – When booking on-site repairs (with your permission).
• Remote Access Data – Temporary session logs for troubleshooting purposes.

3. How We Use Your Information
We use collected information to:
• Provide and improve our services.
• Facilitate remote and on-site troubleshooting.
• Process payments and manage subscriptions.
• Ensure security and prevent fraud.
• Offer personalized customer support.
• Send service updates and promotions (with your consent).

4. Data Security & Protection
We implement strict security measures, including:
• End-to-end encryption for remote sessions.
• Secure payment processing to protect financial transactions.
• Limited access controls ensuring only authorized personnel handle user data.
• Real-time activity logs for transparency in remote troubleshooting.

5. Data Sharing & Third-Party Services
We do not sell your personal data. However, we may share information with:
• Trusted IT technicians for service fulfillment (with quality control measures in place).
• Payment processors to handle transactions securely.
• Legal authorities if required to comply with laws or protect against fraud.

6. User Rights & Control
You have the right to:
• Access and update your personal data.
• Request deletion of your account and service history.
• Opt-out of promotional communications.
• Review remote session logs for transparency.

7. Changes to This Privacy Policy
We may update this policy from time to time. Users will be notified of significant changes via email or in-app alerts.

8. Contact Us
For questions or concerns regarding this Privacy Policy, contact us at:
Email: business.techassistph@gmail.com
Address: Balayan, Batangas

• You agree not to misuse TechAssist for fraudulent activities.

3. Services Provided

• Some services may require payment, and fees will be disclosed before purchase.

4. Limitation of Liability
TechAssist is not responsible for:
• Any data loss, hardware damage, or indirect damages caused by the use of our services.

5. Termination
We reserve the right to:

6. Changes to Terms
TechAssist may update these terms from time to time.
• Continued use of our services implies acceptance of the changes.
